comments: This may be a race condition in all tests, but all tests is failing on SharedTaskFolderTest.deleteDir. I'll try to paste in the failure in a comment.

This test has other problems with it, and Wes has an open report for it.  I've removed it from the test suite for now since this isn't functionality that's currently deployed.
